title: Wikipedia - Feminism
description:
"Feminism is a collection of movements and ideologies aimed at defining, establishing, and defending equal political, economic, and social rights for women. This includes seeking to establish equal opportunities for women in education and employment. A feminist advocates or supports the rights and equality of women."

Wikipedia Feminism ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to Feminism in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection; and for independent researchers
looking to followup the citations and further readings, you can find most of them in the radical seed (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
